alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Halifax; Nash; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:51PM EDT until August 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nash County in central North Carolina... West central Halifax County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Wake County in central North Carolina... Central Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 451 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wake Forest, or 14 miles southwest of Louisburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Nashville, Wake Forest, Zebulon, Dortches, Bailey, Bunn, Knightdale, Wendell and Rolesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
